translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大小様々な国が沢山ある地帯の名称ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the name of the region with many countries, both large and small.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みーんな大好き、志津香さんマリアさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone loves it, Shizuka-san and Maria-san's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムもこの自由都市にあるのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: customs are also in this Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、お次は極東の島国、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, next is the island nation in the Far East,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫が国主代理を務める、JAPAN」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, where Princess Kaoru serves as the acting ruler.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「和の雰囲気が強いお国で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a country with a strong Japanese atmosphere,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暮らしている方々も日本人と言われているの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the people living there are referred to as Japanese.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPAN人じゃないのよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're not 'JAPAN' people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日本人なの、お言葉も日本語。不思議よね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they are Japanese, and their language is Japanese. It's quite curious, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つい最近まで小さな国同士で戦いまくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until recently, small countries were constantly at war with each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦乱の時代だったんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was an era of continuous conflict...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様が織田家を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lord Rance led the Oda family

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天下統一を成し遂げたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and achieved the unification of the realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、次は国ではないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, next, although not a country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影響力の強い二つの勢力の説明よー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll explain two very influential factions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはAL教会。正式名ALICE教会。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First is the AL Church. Its full name is the ALICE Church.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王はクルックー・モフスさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Pope is Mr. Kurokku Mofusu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: AL教はこの世界にある宗教の名ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The AL Church is a religious organization in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このAL教、この世界における最大宗教であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This AL Church is the largest religion in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冠婚葬祭は大陸ではほぼぜーんぶAL式ってレベル」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and almost all ceremonies like weddings and funerals on the continent are conducted in the AL style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なもんで、AL教の総本山と呼ばれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, the headquarters of the AL Church,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島という島だけが領地なんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is the island called Kawanakajima, is their only territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その影響力は各国でもかなーり強いの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but their influence is quite strong in every country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お次はパステル・カラーさん率いる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next is the Color Village of the demi-humans called Color, led by Pastel Color-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 亜人種であるカラーの住む、カラーの里、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who are a demi-human race called Color.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペンシルカウね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They live in Pencilcow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この亜人種のカラーさんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This demi-human race, the Color,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬまで若いまま、とっても美人揃いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: remains youthful until death, and they are all very beautiful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法と弓矢が得意な種族さんなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they're a species skilled in magic and archery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、重要なのは額にあるクリスタル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An important feature is the crystal on their forehead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを額から抜くとカラーさんが死ぬ代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you remove it from their forehead, the Color person dies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーっても魔力の込められた装備品になるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it becomes a very powerfully enchanted piece of equipment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なもんで、ヘルマンに過去何度も襲われる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, they have been attacked many times in the past by Hellman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても可哀想な種族だったりもするわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making them a very pitiful race.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、遂に最後！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, finally, the last one!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、きたー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kyaa, here it comes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王、魔人が支配する魔物界よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon World, ruled by the Demon King and Demons!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、大陸の左半分が領地となる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, this explains the Demon World, which takes up the left half of the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の説明も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the explanation of the Demon World as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらは基本的に魔物しか暮らしてないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, only monsters live here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なもんで、人間にとっては入っちゃいけない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, for humans, it's a forbidden and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーっても危険な地域という認識ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: very dangerous area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、ざっとこんなもんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, that's roughly it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい説明が後ろの画像に載ってるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More detailed explanations are shown in the images behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味のある方は是非是非」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if you're interested, please take a look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、あなた、またねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, see you again!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい来たー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it comes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と関係深い女性の方々のお話ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the women closely related to Lord Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様の目的は冒険して世界中を見ることでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance's purpose is not only to adventure and see the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚われのお姫様を助けることでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor only to rescue the captive princess,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大小様々な国が沢山ある地帯の名称ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the name of the region with many countries, both large and small.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みーんな大好き、志津香さんマリアさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone loves it, Shizuka-san and Maria-san's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムもこの自由都市にあるのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: customs are also in this Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、お次は極東の島国、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, next is the island nation in the Far East,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫が国主代理を務める、JAPAN」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, where Princess Kaoru serves as the acting ruler.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「和の雰囲気が強いお国で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a country with a strong Japanese atmosphere,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暮らしている方々も日本人と言われているの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the people living there are referred to as Japanese.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPAN人じゃないのよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're not 'JAPAN' people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日本人なの、お言葉も日本語。不思議よね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they are Japanese, and their language is Japanese. It's quite curious, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つい最近まで小さな国同士で戦いまくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until recently, small countries were constantly at war with each other,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦乱の時代だったんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was an era of continuous conflict...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様が織田家を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lord Rance led the Oda family

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天下統一を成し遂げたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and achieved the unification of the realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、次は国ではないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, next, although not a country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影響力の強い二つの勢力の説明よー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll explain two very influential factions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはAL教会。正式名ALICE教会。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First is the AL Church. Its full name is the ALICE Church.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王はクルックー・モフスさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Pope is Mr. Kurokku Mofusu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: AL教はこの世界にある宗教の名ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The AL Church is a religious organization in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このAL教、この世界における最大宗教であり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This AL Church is the largest religion in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冠婚葬祭は大陸ではほぼぜーんぶAL式ってレベル」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and almost all ceremonies like weddings and funerals on the continent are conducted in the AL style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なもんで、AL教の総本山と呼ばれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, the headquarters of the AL Church,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島という島だけが領地なんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is the island called Kawanakajima, is their only territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その影響力は各国でもかなーり強いの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but their influence is quite strong in every country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お次はパステル・カラーさん率いる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next is the Color Village of the demi-humans called Color, led by Pastel Color-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 亜人種であるカラーの住む、カラーの里、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who are a demi-human race called Color.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペンシルカウね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They live in Pencilcow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この亜人種のカラーさんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This demi-human race, the Color,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬまで若いまま、とっても美人揃いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: remains youthful until death, and they are all very beautiful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法と弓矢が得意な種族さんなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they're a species skilled in magic and archery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、重要なのは額にあるクリスタル。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An important feature is the crystal on their forehead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを額から抜くとカラーさんが死ぬ代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you remove it from their forehead, the Color person dies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーっても魔力の込められた装備品になるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it becomes a very powerfully enchanted piece of equipment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なもんで、ヘルマンに過去何度も襲われる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, they have been attacked many times in the past by Hellman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっても可哀想な種族だったりもするわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making them a very pitiful race.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、遂に最後！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, finally, the last one!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、きたー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kyaa, here it comes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王、魔人が支配する魔物界よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon World, ruled by the Demon King and Demons!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、大陸の左半分が領地となる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, this explains the Demon World, which takes up the left half of the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の説明も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the explanation of the Demon World as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらは基本的に魔物しか暮らしてないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, only monsters live here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なもんで、人間にとっては入っちゃいけない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, for humans, it's a forbidden and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーっても危険な地域という認識ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: very dangerous area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーっ、ざっとこんなもんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, that's roughly it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細かい説明が後ろの画像に載ってるので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More detailed explanations are shown in the images behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味のある方は是非是非」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if you're interested, please take a look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、あなた、またねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, see you again!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい来たー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it comes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と関係深い女性の方々のお話ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the women closely related to Lord Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様の目的は冒険して世界中を見ることでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance's purpose is not only to adventure and see the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 囚われのお姫様を助けることでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor only to rescue the captive princess,
